Others: The match four of the five-match T20I series between India and Zimbabwe is scheduled for July 13, 2024.
India leads the series 2-1 after winning the last two matches.
Zimbabwe's batting lineup has struggled in the series, with setting up against India's lethal bowling attack being a problem.
The pitch at Harare Sports Club is considered one of the best surfaces for playing cricket, offering equal assistance for both batsmen and bowlers.
As per the live weather report, the weather during the IND vs ZIM 4th T20I will be crystal clear, with no chances of rain.
